name: Board of Directors
description: Appoints and monitors the Chief Executive Officer and the general health of the Company.

name: Board Member
description: Serves on the Board of Directors

name: Chairman of the Board
description: Chairs meetings of the Board of Directors.

name: Executive Officer
description: Executive Officers wield executive decision making power.

duties.description: Review and execute contracts on behalf of the Company within the Officer's designated domain.

name: Executive Vice President
description: Executive Officers wield executive decision making power.

duties.description: Execute contracts on behalf of the Company.

name: Senior Vice President
description: The most senior, non-executive manager.

name: Chief Executive Officer
description: The highest ranking company executive with final responsibility for major strategic decisions and management of operation and corporate resources. Acts as primary contact between the Board of Directors and corporate operations. The CEO is also the "public face" of the company.

name: President
description: Oversees critical business operations.

duties.description: Fulfills statutory requirements as Company President.

name: Chief Operating Officer
description: Senior executive overseeing all day-to-day non-technical operational corporate functions.

duties.description: Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: General Manager
description: Senior manager overseeing (non-consumer/non-client) internal, partner, and other 3rd party relationships, as well as overall company policy/processes and corporate expenses.

name: Chief Technical Officer
description: Senior executive in charge of technical implementation and operations.

duties.description: Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Head of Research & Development
description: Oversees implementation of software products.

name: Chief of Technical Operations
description: Oversees all technical implementation/devops.

name: Chief Financial Officer
description: Senior executive in charge of corporate accounting records and strategic finance.

name: Controller
description: Senior manager with direct responsibility for the corporate accounts and books. Oversees all payables and receivables. Conducts internal financial audits and is the primary contact for external financial auditors.

name: Accountant
description: Responsible for maintaining Company financial records.

name: Chief Revenue Officer
description: Senior executive in charge of revenue generation.

name: Chief Marketing Officer
description: Senior executive in charge of brand management, corporate and product messaging.

name: Head of Marketing
description: Senior manager in charge marketing, brand management, and messaging.

name: Training Manager
description: Responsible for development and implementation of client training curriculum.

name: Chief Sales Officer
description: Senior executive in charge of corporate sales strategy and oversight of the sales team.

name: Head of Sales
description: Senior manager in charge of all sales.

name: Sales
description: Responsible for directly selling to potential clients.

name: Head of Integrations
description: Oversees all integrations with third-parties.

name: Integrations Manager
description: Oversees integrations of Company services/products with third-party partners. Works directly with partners during the integration process.

name: Head of Implementations
description: Oversees all client implementations.

name: Implementations Manager
description: Oversees implementation of Company services/products with clients. Works directly with clients and with the client's assigned Account Manager during the implementation process.

name: Account Manager
description: The Account Manager is an operational role managing technical/operational relationship with specific clients and partners. Account Managers are the primary technical contact for clients and partners and also internally support sales and integrations.

duties.description: Provide first tier support for incoming client technical issues.
Provide internal support for technical and operational questions regarding their account.

name: Chief Administrative Officer
description: Senior executive in charge of corporate administration, including human resources and legal matters.

duties.description: Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Head of Administration
description: Senior manager in charge of corporate administration, including human resources and legal matters.

duties.description: Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Head of Human Resources
description: Oversees and has final responsibility on HR matters.

name: Human Resources Manager
description: Managers human resoruces agents and handles elevated cases directly.

name: Human Resources Agent
description: Oversees personnel management and compliance.

name: Product Manager
description: Responsible for coordinating stakeholder input and managing product specification and setting development priorities.

name: UI Designer
description: Produces style guidelines, graphic/UI assets, mockups, and similar artifacts to guide and support implementation of front-end user interface.

name: Brand Manager
description: Manages brand assets and usage along with setting and enforcing policy regarding corporate messaging and identity.

name: Social Media Coordinator
description: Responsible for developing and implementing overall social media strategy inline with brand and product messaging and target demographics.

name: Regional Marketing Manager
description: Oversees implementation of corporate marketing campaigns. Develops and oversees implementation of local campaigns.

name: Business Analyst
description: Searches and and secures new lines of business, channels, and partners.

name: Head of Business Development
description: Manages overall business development strategy.

name: Software Engineer
description: Qualified to modify and review [qual] software code. Sensitive changes must be reviewed by a Senior Software Engineer prior to being deployed.

name: Senior Software Engineer
description: Qualified to review and approve changes to sensitive [qual] code.

name: Chief Software Engineer
description: Has final responsibility for production [qual] code.; Chief Software Engineer's approval is required for sensitive changes involving customer privacy, regulatory issues, and/or exceptional complexity.

duties.description: Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Data Engineer
description: Qualified to modify, review, and manage [qual] database schemas and DBMSs.

name: Senior Data Engineer
description: Qualified to review and approve changes to production [qual] schemas and DBMSs.

name: Chief Data Engineer
description: Has final responsibility for production schemas and DBMSs.; Chief Data Engineer's approval is required for sensitive changes involving customer privacy, regulatory issues, and/or exceptional complexity.

duties.description: Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Host Engineer
description: Qualified to configure and management of [qual] hosts systems.

name: Senior Host Engineer
description: Qualified to approve changes to production [qual] host systems.

name: Chief Host Engineer
description: Has final responsibility for production host systems.; Chief Host Engineer approval is required for sensitive changes involving host security, regulatory issues, or exceptional complexity.

duties.description: Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Network Engineer
description: Qualified to configure and manage Company networks.

name: Senior Network Engineer
description: Qualified to review and approve changes to production networks.

name: Chief Network Engineer
description: Has final responsibility for the integrity and security of production networks.; Chief Network Engineer approval is required for changes to sensitive networks providing access to private customer data, under regulatory scrutiny, or any change of exceptional complexity.

duties.description: Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Cloud Engineer
description: Qualified to configure and manage [qual] cloud services.

name: Senior Cloud Engineer
description: Qualified to review and approve changes to production [qual] cloud services.

name: Chief Cloud Engineer
description: Has final responsibility for production cloud services systems.; Chief Cloud Engineer approval is required for sensitive changes involving cloud services security, regulatory issues, or exceptional complexity.

duties.description: Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Quality Engineer
description: Qualified to ascertain correctness and conformance of Company products.

name: Senior Quality Engineer
description: Qualified to review and approve changes [qual] quality systems.

name: Chief Quality Engineer
description: Has final responsibility for quality assurance.

name: Project Manager
description: Responsible for working with implementation product management to optimize implementation with regard to efficiency and stakeholder priorities.

name: Customer Service Agent
description: Responsible for handling of customer service requests.

name: Customer Service Manager
description: Oversees Customer Service Agents. Sensitive issues of particular complexity or involving particularly high value customers may be referred to the Customer Service Manager.

name: Head of Customer Service
description: Oversees all of customer service operations.

name: In House Counsel
description: Oversees legal matters, agreements, and advises Company on [qual] matters.

name: Policy Engineer
description: Manages and develops Company policy definition and implementation. Also works on verification, evidence gathering and compliance.

name: Lead Policy Engineer
description: Leads the Company's internal policy development, implementation, and verification.

name: Security Officer
description: Non-executive officer with final responsibility for matters relating to Company security.

duties.description: Works with senior management to develop and maintain the Company's security policy and infrastructure. _(PCI DSS 3.2.1 ref 12.4, 12.5.1, 12.5.3)_

Works with line management and technical staff to implement Company security policy to ensure understanding, improve effectiveness, and where possible simplify and automate end user procedures. _(PCI DSS 3.2.1 ref 12.4, 12.5.1, 12.5.3)
Develops curriculum for and oversees implementation of a Security Awareness Program. _(PCI DSS 3.2.1 ref 12.6)_
Oversees development, verification, and implementation of the Incident Response Framework. _(PCI DSS v3.2.1 ref 12.10)_
Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Compliance Officer
description: Non-executive officer with final responsibility for matters relating to compliance and Company Policy in general.

duties.description: Ensures Company Policy is compliant with PCI DSS 3.2.1, SOC 2 Type I, and SOC 2 Type II compliance standards.
Oversee and ensure updates to Company Policy are according to the Company Change Control Policy.
Works with <role>department heads</role> to define, implement, and maintain procedures.
Indepndently verifies policy implementation.
Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Privacy Officer
description: Non-executive officer with final responsibility for matters relating to customer and staff privacy.

duties.description: Is a member of the Incident Response Team.

name: Head of Security, Compliance, & Privacy
description: Oversees administrative aspects of security, compliance, and customer privacy.

name: Key Admin
description: Responsible for managing one or more Company keys involved in critical operations or sensitive access.
notes: The designation is generally applied to Executives, Compliance Agents, and/or domain Chiefs or Seniors. Sufficient backups should be provided such that a Key Manager is available at all times for all key types.

name: Access Manager
description: Can oversee and grant access to sensitive systems.

name: Operational Admin
description: Has full access to sensitive operational services. May be designated for emergency and/or backup purposes.

name: Incident Response Team
description: Team members are on call for emergency response and/or disaster recovery.

name: Network Alert Responder
description: Responsible for receiving and evaluating network alerts.

name: Badge Manager
description: Badge Managers oversee issuing and tracking visitor badges.; Sufficient backups should be designated such that a Badge Manager is always available at each physical location.

name: Production Data Reader
description: An individual with access to sensitive production data.

name: Sensitive Data Handler
description: Qualified to deal with sensitive data such as card holder data, social security numbers, or other information that requires special handling.

name: VPN Manager
description: Manages the company's centralized VPN services.

name: Consultant
description: Provides general or project specific [qual] expertise. Specific duties will be enumerated as part of the epmloyement or contractor agreement

name: Senior Management Team
description: Annually reviews Company compliance and key processes.

duties.description: Is a member of the Senior Management Team. _(SOC 2 Type I ref 1.1, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.1)_

name: Department Heads
description: Heads a company department. Genarally, non-executive personell report dircetly or indirectly to a department head and collectively the department heads should encompass all company staff with the exception of the CEO and the Department Heads themselves.

name: Change Control Board
description: Reviews proposed changes and assigns priorities in accordance with cost and strategic priorities.

name: IT Personnel
description: Any individual working within a technical capacity within the company.

name: Security & Compliance Officer
description: Oversees general security and compliance, including safeguarding customer and client data.

name: Outside Counsel
description: Legal counsel hired by and directly reporting to the Board of Directors.

name: External Auditors
description: Perform financial audits and report directly to the Board of Directors.

name: Finance
description: General finance analysis.

name: Marketing Administrator
description: Oversees general marketing process and logistics.
